title: Heir to the empire
creator: Zahn, Timothy
description: It's five years after Return of the Jedi: the Rebel Alliance has destroyed the Death Star, defeated Darth Vader and the Emperor, and driven out the remnants of the old Imperial Starlfleet to a distant corner of the galaxy. Princess Leia and Han Solo are married and expecting Jedi Twins. And Luke Skywalker has become the first in a long-awaited line of Jedi Knights. But thousand of light-years away
Variant printing also issued by the Science Fiction Book Club, measured at 22 cm
Printing statement and date of printing taken from Internet Speculative Fiction Data Base
Three book cycle includes: Volume 1 -- Heir to the Empire -- Volume 2 -- Dark force rising -- Volume 3 -- The last command
